EmailTemplate.name: Remaining Items to Activate Account (1381437756.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Remaining Items to Activate Account (1381437756.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Sue, I hope your week is going well. I wanted to follow up on the remaining items needed to re-activate your account: o I have attached an updated Net Cash Estimate based on current information in your account settings. Please review and let me know if you have any questions. I am also more than happy to review it with you via phone. This estimate assumes:§ 40 hrs a week at $110 per hour§ $500 a month in non-billable operating expenses (this is just a conservative average of the amount of expenses we typically see to show you how the affect your take home pay)§ Single Medical and Dental Coverage§ Retirement at 20.04%§ Life insurance and Long term disability insurance – Please note you have to be working at least 25 hours a week to be eligible to make a claim against the policy per Aetna guidelines. I don’t think this should be an issue since you are working full time but I wanted to make sure you were aware. o Please provide the address where you will be preforming the work o Please complete your MBO access profile by logging into MBO Access <https://access.mbopartners.com/> and completing the “Industry Expertise” and “Disciplines” sections of your profile. This information needed for our workmen’s comp. policy and must be completed before I can activate your account and get you billing. Your user ID and password is the same as your MBO Business Center. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <
